text: - Roche is a global company

and focused on finding new
medicines and diagnostics.

We use our AWS cloud
providers as a platform

to make sure we're able to
enable our digital solutions
faster to the market.

Today, we have around
140 plus digital products
hosted on our platform,
with 2,000 plus developers.
Our main focus is automation
and self-service to the core,
which reduces the operations workload.
We keep FinOps in mind
whenever we provide any AWS environments
or accounts to our developers
to make sure we are efficient.

In 2022 alone, we
realized about $9 million,
and that's a lot,

and we managed to reinvest
in other critical projects.

So FinOps is a core capability
for us to scale as well.

We are enabling AWS
environments across the globe
in 10 different regions,
making sure we have

world-class technologies
in place for security.

From the get go, you
get an AWS environment,
start building your application.

Don't worry about privacy
and security capabilities.
We have a shared responsibility

within our developers
as well as the platform.

So you can guess how many
threats we have mitigated
this year alone.

It's about 500 million
threats we have mitigated,
just this year.

We are excited to explore
the complex market

and to scale our cloud-native
platform in China as well
to enable digital solutions.
At the same time, we are also exploring
our new capabilities like generative AI

to make sure we are able
to provide AI capabilities
to our digital solution,
which reaches our patients and providers,

and making sure we are doing
now what patient needs next.
